items.name: Silver Pendant Necklace
items.description: Elegant silver pendant with cubic zirconia. This beautiful piece features a delicate chain and stunning pendant that catches the light from every angle.

items.name: Diamond Tennis Bracelet
items.description: Stunning diamond tennis bracelet featuring 3 carats of brilliant-cut diamonds set in 18K white gold. A true statement piece that will last a lifetime.
